trans-unit.source: Adds supplementary information to a bookmark that enables it to access a subset of its scope handles, excluding handles that are not required.
trans-unit.target: 將補充資訊加入至可讓書籤存取其範圍控制代碼子集的書籤，排除不需要的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.ExclusiveHandle" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Activities.ExclusiveHandle" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The environment in which the handle is created.
Creates a list of default <see cref="T:System.Activities.BookmarkScopeHandle" /> objects from handle variables in the specified handle initialization context.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的控制代碼初始化內容中，建立控制代碼變數的預設 <see cref="T:System.Activities.BookmarkScopeHandle" /> 物件清單。

trans-unit.source: The environment in which the handle is created.
The token used to identify and access a group of bookmarks that operate under the same protocol in a workflow activity operation.
trans-unit.target: 在工作流程活動作業中，用於識別並存取以相同通訊協定運作之書籤群組的權杖。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified bookmark scope handle to the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Activities.BookmarkScopeHandle" /> objects using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的內容，將指定的書籤範圍控制代碼加入至 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Activities.BookmarkScopeHandle" />。

trans-unit.source: If this method is called after a bookmark has been created under this exclusive scope, a <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果在此專屬範圍內建立書籤之後呼叫這個方法，將會擲回 <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a new or existing <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Activities.BookmarkScopeHandle" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> 物件之新的或既有 <see cref="T:System.Activities.BookmarkScopeHandle" />。

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection of bookmark scope handles.
trans-unit.target: 書籤範圍控制代碼的唯讀集合。

trans-unit.source: The environment in which the handle is created.
Sets the registered bookmark scope handles back to the defaults.
trans-unit.target: 將註冊的書籤範圍控制代碼設定回預設值。

trans-unit.source: If this method is called when there are bookmarks registered with the exclusive handle, a <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果在有專屬控制代碼註冊的書籤時呼叫這個方法，將會擲回 <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。
